title: Synthesis and bioactivity investigation of benzophenone and its derivatives
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20339-20350
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02797C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chun Lei, Wanjing Yang, Ziyu Lin, Yuyan Tao, Renping Ye, Yucai Jiang, Yuli Chen, Beidou Zhou
Several benzophenones and their derivatives were synthesised, and most of which showed antitumour activity, especially compound 1. Therefore, the antitumour mechanism of compound 1 was investigated through network pharmacology and molecular docking.
